member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.ProgramTypeUtility.tryParseIso8601Duration(System.String)
member.summary: Tries to parse the specified value into based on the assertion that the value is in ISO8601 format.
member.remarks:
For example, "P0DT1H0M0S".
‚ÄúDurations define the amount of intervening time in a time interval and are represented by the format P[n]Y[n]M[n]DT[n]H[n]M[n]S or P[n]W‚Ä¶‚Äù
[ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601 ]

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.Unset
T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.RevertLayer
member.summary: ‚ÄúThe revert-layer CSS keyword rolls back the value of a property in a cascade layer to the value of the property in a CSS rule matching the element in a previous cascade layer.‚Äù

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.Revert
member.summary: ‚ÄúThe revert CSS keyword reverts the cascaded value of the property from its current value to the value the property would have had if no changes had been made by the current style origin to the current element. Thus, it resets the property to its inherited value if it inherits from its parent or to the default value established by the user agent's stylesheet (or by user styles, if any exist).‚Äù

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.Initial
member.summary: ‚ÄúThe initial CSS keyword applies the initial (or default) value of a property to an element.‚Äù

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.Inherit
member.summary: ‚ÄúThe inherit CSS keyword causes the element to take the computed value of the property from its parent element.‚Äù

member.name: P:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance.Value
member.summary: Returns the representation of the inheritance name.

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.Models.CssInheritance
member.summary: Enumerates a subset of the CSS inheritance values.

member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility.fontVariant(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{Songhay.Modules.Models.CssFontVariant})
member.summary: A function for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúThe font-variant CSS shorthand property allows you to set all the font variants for a font.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-variant

member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility.fontVariantNumeric(Songhay.Modules.Models.CssFontVariantNumeric)
member.summary: A function for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúThe font-variant-numeric CSS property controls the usage of alternate glyphs for numbers, fractions, and ordinal markers.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-variant-numeric

member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility.fontVariantLigatures(Songhay.Modules.Models.CssFontVariantLigatures)
member.summary: A function for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúThe font-variant-ligatures CSS property controls which ligatures and contextual forms are used in textual content of the elements it applies to. This leads to more harmonized forms in the resulting text.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-variant-ligatures

member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility.fontVariantCaps(Songhay.Modules.Models.CssFontVariantCaps)
member.summary: A function for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúThe font-variant-caps CSS property controls the use of alternate glyphs for capital letters.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-variant-caps

member.name: M:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility.fontVariantAlternates(Songhay.Modules.Models.CssFontVariantAlternates)
member.summary: A function for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúThe font-variant-alternates CSS property controls the usage of alternate glyphs. These alternate glyphs may be referenced by alternative names defined in @font-feature-values.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-variant-alternates

member.name: T:Songhay.Modules.CssDeclarationUtility
member.summary: Selected functions for CSS declaration.
member.remarks: ‚ÄúWhen a property is paired with a value, this pairing is called a CSS declaration. CSS declarations are found within CSS Declaration Blocks.‚Äù üìñ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/First_steps/How_CSS_is_structured#properties_and_values
